form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Naturalization and Immigration Service Letter, G-2

full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/8/2023 OF UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service P.O. BOX 11110 Miami, Florida 3111-1110 A: 22 497 006 On MAY 21 1997 you appeared for examination on your application for Naturalization, and requested a Medical Exception to the INA 312 requirements. Attached is a N-648 (Medical Certification for Disability Exception), this form must be filled out completely and returned to this address within 60 days. If we have not received this form by JUL 21 1997 your application for Naturalization will be closed. When we receive the form we will schedule you for an examination. Mail the completed form to the following address: U.S. IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE ATTN: MEDICAL EXCEPTION P.O. BOX 11110 MIAMI, FL. 33111-1110 Form G-2 (Rev. 1-2-80)
